description: Generate tailored quality criteria and scoring guides from your task descriptions. Refine objectives, produce 6-8-10 benchmarks across configurable dimensions, and save both the refined task and the rubric for consistent evaluations. Streamline reviews with clear, reusable standards.

expectedScore.description: Expected target score for quality evaluation (0-10 scale, default: 8)

dimensionCount.description: Number of quality dimensions to generate (default: 5)

capabilities.name: generate_task_analysis_prompt
capabilities.description: Generate task analysis prompt for LLM to analyze core tasks in user conversations

capabilities.name: generate_quality_dimensions_prompt
capabilities.description: Generate quality dimensions prompt based on task analysis. Uses default target score from configuration or task complexity to determine evaluation strictness.
